text: Jo kuch bhi Allah in bastiyon ke logon se apne Rasool ki tarf palta de woh Allah , aur Rasool, aur rishtedaron , aur yatama (orphans), aur masakeen, aur musafiron, ke liye hai taa-ke woh tumhare maaldaaron hi ke darmiyan gardish na karta rahey. Jo kuch Rasool tumhein de woh lelo aur jis cheez se woh tum ko roak dey ussey ruk jao. Allah se daro, Allah sakht saza dene wala hai
